name: The Last Error (itch)
description:
Hi guys! This again Anatoly from Russia. This is an BETA version of the game, so there's a lot of bugs))) But it will help you get a first impression ... Please help me get Steam GREENLIGHT) I do not sleep at night, I lost my job. But every day I continue to work on this project) Thank you friends! I would be glad of any help! And excuse my English)

GreenLight:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...

In this version:
  • 7 castles
  • 70 levels
  • 7 bosses
